title.term: Album Ducler 1: Castes et professions de l'Inde

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: 2nd series of gouache paintings commissioned by Ducler in 1931.
In this series of 204 gouache paintings are found illustrations of people of different castes and professions from India (particularly from South India).

collation.desc: the front cover. BnF shelfmark sticker on verso.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Blank except for BnF old shelfmark on f[1]r.
204 folios = Gouache Paintings. Library Arabic foliation 1-204 in black ink. Parallel original (?) Arabic foliation 1b-204b in black pencil. Verso blank.
1 folio = Title Page. No foliation. Inserted between f74 and f75 of U1. Verso blank.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

layoutDesc.layout: Black frame divided in two boxes: the upper, larger, box for the gouache painting; the lower, smaller box for bilingual labels (Tamil in Tamil script and French in Latin script).

decoNote.desc: Royal cypher N, of Napoléon III (spine).

additions.desc: Library's name (spine): BIBLIOTH. IMP, that is, Bibliothèque Impériale.
Title printed in golden letters (spine): CASTES ET PROFESSIONS DE L'INDE
Name of binder and date of binding (spine): J. WEBER 1865
BnF current shelfmark sticker (front cover, verso): INDIEN 743
BnF old shelfmark in black ink (f[1]r): Ind. 98.
Library stamp (red ink) (u2, f[1]r; in the labels box of every recto folio of U1): B.R (below a crown, both in an oval), that is, Bibliothèque Royale.

binding.p: Library binding. With name of the library, title, royal cypher, binder's name and date of binding on the spine.

origin.origDate: See 1831 in the lower right corner of the labels box of every recto folio of U1.

provenance.p: Gouache paintings commissioned by Philippe Étienne Ducler (1778-1840), colonial administrator in Karikal (Karaikkāl). See Burnouf (1832, p. 86).

acquisition.p: Acquired, July 22nd, 1833, from Ducler (BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1833-1848, no. 95 (2e série).

listBibl.bibl: Burnouf, Eugène. 1832. “Rapport fait au Conseil, dans la séance du 2 juillet 1832, sur les collections de manuscrits et de dessins rapportées de l’Inde par M. Ducler, administrateur de Carical, membre de la Société asiatique.” Journal asiatique 10, p. 84-87. — Report by E. Burnouf & J. B. Eyriès.
Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 109.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
